mapper.select: select pool.id as id, pool.brand as brand, pool.linkman as contract, pool.first_classification_name as firstClassification, pool.second_classification_name as secondClassification, pool.city_name as city, pool.create_time as createTime, pool.name as merchantName, pool.number_store as numberStore, pool.phone_no as phoneNo, pool.level_name as merchantLevel, pool.type as merchantType from public_sea_pool pool where pool.is_delete = 0 and pool.id = #{merchantId}
